findings.title: Centralization Risk
findings.description: HIGH centralization risk related to upgradability. Centralization of ownership creates a risk of rug pull scams. Active contract ownership identified, which can lead to elevated impact on smart contract safety and security.
findings.location: Contract upgradeability, PUMP DAO's smart contracts

findings.title: Unchecked Owner Privileges
findings.description: When ownership is transferred, previous privileges should not remain authorized.
